document.full_text: president obama set forth non-negotiable conditions that he said libya must immediately meet to avoid military action to enforce a no-flight zone and block attacks by the regime on civilians and rebels.
document.title: obama warns libya, but attacks go on
lines_and_colors: president obama set forth non-negotiable conditions that he said libya must immediately meet to avoid military action to enforce a no-flight zone and block attacks by the regime on civilians and rebels.
